name: Find These Hidden Vegetables! Multiple Choice Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Oscar, rotting vegetables go in the compost pile, not in the salad!
questions.explanation:
carrot.

	OsCAR, ROTting vegetables go.... Most children like carrot and celery sticks.

questions.text: The man with the cigar licks his lips when he smells vegetables cooking.
questions.explanation:
garlic.

	The man with the ciGAR LICks his lips.... I love crushed garlic cooked in olive oil--it makes almost any dish taste better!

questions.text: Mary said with a gasp, "A rag usually is needed to wipe up the counter after chopping vegetables."
questions.explanation:
asparagus.

	Mary said with a gASP, "A RAG USually is needed.... The thinner the asparagus, the better they taste.

questions.text: Her mouth full of vegetables, Mary mumbled, "Wasn't that the last ring? Be an angel and answer the phone more quickly next time."
questions.explanation:
string bean & bean.

	Mary said, "Wasn't that the laST RING? BE AN angel and.... Calling someone a "string bean" means that he or she is tall and slender.

questions.text: Is Loni on the phone ordering some vegetables from the market?
questions.explanation:
onion.

	Is LONI ON the phone...? I love onion tarts--pies made with eggs, cream, onions, and cheese.

questions.text: I said to my pet emu: "Sh! Rooming houses like this one don't allow loud chomping sounds after 10 PM. Please eat your vegetables more quietly!"
questions.explanation:
mushroom.

	I said to my pet eMU: "SH! ROOMing houses.... An emu is a flightless bird like an ostrich. A mushroom is actually a fungus, not a vegetable. Careful--some wild mushrooms are poisonous!

questions.text: We brought home from the bus depot a torn paper sack full of vegetables.
questions.explanation:
potato.

	We brought home from the bus dePOT A TOrn paper sack.... Here are just a few of my favorite potato dishes: mashed potatoes, potato pancakes, scalloped potatoes, hashed browns, and Tater Tots.

questions.text: Mitch, I like vegetarian meals--don't you?
questions.explanation:
chili & chile & chilli.

	MitCH, I LIke.... There are many, many different kinds of spicy chili (or chile) peppers such as jalapenos, Serranos and Habaneros. Like sweet bell peppers, spicy ones may be red, orange, yellow, or green.

questions.text: I wonder if the meatpacking industry is quashing information on the benefits of a vegetarian diet.
questions.explanation:
squash.

	I wonder if the meatpacking industry iS QUASHing information.... Kinds of squash include zucchini, acorn squash, butternut squash, and spaghetti squash.

questions.text: You rascal, lions don't eat vegetables--they're carnivores!
questions.explanation:
scallion & scallions.

	You raSCAL, LIONs don't eat vegetables.... A scallion is a long, skinny onion. Thinly sliced scallions taste good in salads.
